alert.note: Alert for Dixon Entrance to Cape Decision Coastal Area; Southern Inner Channels (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 13 at 3:19PM AKST until January 15 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM FRIDAY TO 6 AM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts to 60 mph expected. Winds shifting to the southwest Friday evening. * WHERE...Dixon Entrance to Cape Decision Coastal Area and Southern Inner Channels including Craig, Klawock, Ketchikan, and Metlakatla. * WHEN...From 6 AM Friday to 6 AM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Isolated landslides are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Two rounds of high winds are expected during the warning timeframe. The first round is Friday morning with strong SE winds. The second round is Friday night through early Saturday morning with strong SW winds. Given the saturated ground from recent rain and snow, rising snow levels, and strong winds with a wind shift, there is a rising potential for isolated landslides.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Dixon Entrance to Cape Decision Coastal Area; Southern Inner Channels
